trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the user decides not to trust the entity that is requesting a token after reviewing the information from their certificate.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者決定不要信任要求權杖檢閱憑證中的資訊之後，該實體時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the user clicks "I am not satisfied with this organization's identity/policies" in the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)] user interface.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 我不滿意這個組織的身分識別/原則 」 中，會擲回這個例外狀況[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)]使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息會描述錯誤並考量目前系統文化特性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的內容應該要讓使用者能夠讀懂。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>物件，其中包含有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件，其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。
